items.title: Here’s Who Trump’s H-1B Visa Fee Will Hurt More Than Startups
items.description: On Friday, the administration announced a $100,000 fee for foreign workers on the specialty visa. It could actually help tech companies and startups.

items.description: Why Connecticut understands how rehabilitating brownfield sites will raise property values and land use.

items.title: New RTO Rules Sound Strict, but Employees Aren’t Blinking

items.title: Are Your Company’s AI Chatbots Receiving Confidential Business Info?
items.description: Using AI tools can be helpful at work, until your company’s private financial data leaks onto the internet.

items.title: Why the AI for Sales Hype May Be Overblown
items.description: Companies rushing to adopt AI tools to boost sales and revenues may not see financial benefits until the technology evolves.
